Interface CalcButton

All Known Implementing Classes:
CalculateButton, FuncButton, NextRoundButton, RedoButton, ShopRerollButton, TextButton, UndoButton
public interface CalcButton
Represents any button that can appear in the game

  • Method Summary

    Description

  • Method Details

    • onClick

      void onClick(GameState state, Properties properties)
      Should be invoked when the button is clicked
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state
      properties - the properties of the button clicked

    • onAdd

      void onAdd(GameState state, Properties properties, org.python.core.PyComplex count)
      Should be invoked when the button is added to a ButtonCollection
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state
      properties - the properties of the button after it was added
      count - the amount added

    • render

      void render(GameState state, Properties properties)
      Should render the button
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state
      properties - the properties of the button to render

    • destroy

      void destroy(GameState state, Properties properties)
      Should erase the button
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state
      properties - the properties of the button to erase

    • getPrice

      org.python.core.PyComplex getPrice(GameState state)
      Should return the price of the button, as if it was sold in the shop
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state
      Returns:
      the price of the button

    • getWidth

      int getWidth(GameState state, Properties properties)
      Should return the width of the button, as if it was rendered
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state
      properties - the properties of the not yet rendered button
      Returns:
      the width of the button

    • getHeight

      int getHeight(GameState state, Properties properties)
      Should return the height of the button, as if it was rendered
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state
      properties - the properties of the not yet rendered button
      Returns:
      the height of the button

    • newButton

      CalcButton newButton(List<String> args, String mod_id)
      Should create a new button with the specified arguments. Should be invoked only on a CalcButton object that was initialised without arguments
      Parameters:
      args - the arguments for initialisation, usually from a mod config file
      mod_id - the id of the mod that registered this button
      Returns:
      a new CalcButton

    • getString

      String getString()
      Returns the id of the button, set when invoking newButton(List, String)
      Returns:
      the id of the button

    • isVital

      boolean isVital()
      Returns whether the button is a system button (e.g. '=', 'UNDO', 'REDO', 'Reroll', etc.)
      Returns:
      if the button is a system button
